quotes: The 2011 prize is to be divided equally among the three recipients

roles.title: Nobel Peace Laureate
quotes: Karman was the first Arab woman, the youngest person at that time to have become a Nobel Peace Laureate
Karman, while camped out in Sana'a during ongoing anti-government protests, said: 'I didn't expect it.'
I give this award to all of the youth and all of the women across the Arab world, in Egypt, in Tunisia.
I give this award to all of the youth and all of the women across the Arab world, in Egypt, in Tunisia.
I give this award to all of the youth and all of the women across the Arab world, in Egypt, in Tunisia.
adding that it was also for 'Libya, Syria and Yemen and all the youth and women, this is a victory for our demand for citizenship and human rights.'
adding that it was also for 'Libya, Syria and Yemen and all the youth and women, this is a victory for our demand for citizenship and human rights.'
adding that it was also for 'Libya, Syria and Yemen and all the youth and women, this is a victory for our demand for citizenship and human rights.'

assembled_events.notes: The event is clearly an award based on the mention of 'Nobel Peace Laureate' and the context of receiving a prize.

issues.description: Missing organization information for the award.
Location information seems excessive and not directly tied to the award itself.
